data.body: The doctor --fix command applies all fixes silently without user confirmation. It should: (1) rename corrupt-ticket-verification to corrupt-bead-verification, (2) prompt the user once per check type before applying fixes, (3) for corrupt-bead-verification specifically, offer choice between setting status to in_progress or removing stage:verification label.
